subject: This week's component news: $26,700 in prizes
body:
Hello sm1lies,

This week we've got $26,700 in new design and development competitions, including several that have been reposted with increased prizes -- including one of our first C++ Development competitions, which now pays $1,500. Here are this week's projects:

DESIGN: $12,900 in prizes.
* Java ODF Document Transformer Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java MS OOXML Document Transformer Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* .NET WCF Generic Notes Services Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* Custom Java Hermes Events Security Adapter Version 1.0 ($800.00)
* Custom Java Online Review Upload Services Version 1.0 ($1,500.00)
* Java Resource Management Version 1.1 ($800.00)
* Custom Java Resource Management Persistence Version 1.2 ($800.00)
* Java JSF Interactive Table Version 1.0 ($1,200.00)
* Java JSF Spell Check Version 1.0 ($1,000.00)
  Learn more: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=112

DEVELOPMENT: $13,800 in prizes.
* Custom Java Titan Segment Verification Version 1.0 ($1,200.00)
* C++ Titan Segment Service Version 1.0 ($1,500.00)
* .NET ASP.NET Role Controls Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* .NET WCF Base Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* .NET WCF Host Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* Java MS OOXML Document Content Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* .NET XAML Canvas Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* Custom Java Hermes Events Series Entities Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* Custom .NET Graph Layout Engine Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* Custom .NET COGS Invoker Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* Java ODF Document Content Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* .NET WCF User Providers Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* Custom Java Hermes Events Competition Entities Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* Custom Java Hermes Events Event Entities Version 1.0 ($500.00)
* Custom Java Hermes Events List Entities Version 1.0 ($500.00)
  Learn more: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=113

Good luck!

- The TopCoder Software Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of new TopCoder development opportunities.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
